faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers about shipping, products, customization & materials.

items.q: Do you ship internationally?
items.a: Yes. We can arrange international shipping. For timelines and charges, please contact us before placing a bulk order.

items.q: What materials are used in your nylon bags?
items.a: Our nylon bags use durable, high-quality nylon fabric chosen for daily wear, strength, and long-lasting performance.

items.q: Can I customize the design of backpacks?
items.a: Yes. We support customization (logo, colors, and design changes) for bulk orders. Share your requirements and we’ll guide you.

items.q: Do your school/college bags have reinforced stitching?
items.a: Many models are built with reinforced stitching at stress points to improve durability for regular use.

items.q: What sizes are available for college bags?
items.a: We offer multiple sizes depending on the model. If you need a specific capacity or laptop size support, contact us for recommendations.

items.q: Are delivery bags suitable for fragile items?
items.a: Yes. Delivery bags are designed for secure transport and can help protect items during handling; packing method also matters.

items.q: Do gym bags include shoe / wet compartments?
items.a: Many gym models include separate compartments for shoes or wet items to keep them apart from clothes and electronics.

items.q: Are trolley bags suitable for air travel?
items.a: Most trolley models are designed to meet typical travel use. Always check airline cabin/checked baggage rules for your route.

items.q: Do office bags have laptop compartments?
items.a: Yes. Many office and laptop bags include a dedicated padded compartment to keep laptops/tablets protected.

items.q: Are trekking bags waterproof?
items.a: Some models use water-resistant materials; many also support rain covers. For heavy rain use, ask us for the best option.

items.q: What sizes are available for duffel bags?
items.a: Duffels come in different sizes for gym, short trips, and travel. Share your need and we’ll suggest the right capacity.

items.q: What types of leather do you use?
items.a: Depending on the product, we offer options such as genuine leather and premium alternatives. Availability can vary by model.

items.q: Can I personalize a leather laptop bag with initials?
items.a: Yes. Personalization is possible on select models for bulk/custom orders. Share the placement and style you want.

items.q: What’s included in your gift sets?
items.a: Gift sets can include combinations like bags, wallets, and accessories depending on the set. Exact contents vary by listing/order.

items.q: What makes vegan leather ‘luxury’?
items.a: Luxury vegan leather focuses on premium look and finish while staying cruelty-free, designed to feel and look high-end.

items.q: Are wooden dry-fruit boxes sealed to keep contents fresh?
items.a: Many wooden boxes are made to close securely; sealing/lining can vary by design. Confirm the exact model for airtight needs.

items.q: Can I request custom engravings on wooden gift boxes?
items.a: Yes. Custom engraving is available for bulk/custom orders—share your logo/text/design for approval.

items.q: What types of wood are used in jewellery boxes?
items.a: Wood type depends on the model and finish. We can share the material details once you shortlist a design.

items.q: Are wooden serving trays treated for water resistance?
items.a: Many trays are finished/coated to help resist moisture and stains, but they should be dried after use.

items.q: Can I order personalized wooden products with specific designs?
items.a: Yes. We accept custom designs for bulk orders—share dimensions, artwork and finish preferences.
